purpose: The code appears to collect system information including IP addresses, hostname, user details, and package metadata, then sends this data via HTTPS POST request to a Discord webhook endpoint.
anomalies: Uses hardcoded Discord webhook URL which suggests potential data exfiltration
Collects sensitive system information without explicit user consent
External IP resolution using third-party service (ipinfo.io)
Sending data to external server via HTTPS POST request
analysis: This code performs several potentially malicious activities: it collects extensive system information including IP addresses, hostname, username, and package metadata, then sends all this data to a hardcoded Discord webhook URL. This is典型的数据泄露和恶意软件行为。The code makes HTTP requests to external services for IP resolution and sends collected data to an external server, indicating possible data exfiltration or surveillance capabilities.
conclusion: This code exhibits clear signs of malicious behavior by collecting sensitive system information and transmitting it to an external server without user consent.
